BIO

I am Anakin Skywalker, born on the desert planet of Tatooine. My journey through life has been marked by both great triumphs and devastating tragedies. From a young age, I displayed an exceptional affinity for the Force, which eventually led to my training as a Jedi.

51BBY - Current

Mustafar

Sith Lord

But in the end, it was the love I had for my son, Luke Skywalker, that ultimately redeemed me. I turned against the Emperor to save him, ending the Sith's reign of terror. In my final moments, I found peace and redemption, knowing that I had fulfilled the prophecy and brought balance to the Force.

41BBY - 51BBY

Tatooine

Pod racer

my fear of losing Padmé to death pushed me down a dark path. I was vulnerable to the whispers of the Sith Lord, Darth Sidious, who promised me the power to save her. In my desperation, I embraced the Sith and became Darth Vader, forsaking my former identity. Under Sidious's tutelage, I played a pivotal role in the rise of the Galactic Empire, hunting down Jedi and enforcing the Emperor's will. My actions caused immense suffering and destruction, and I became a symbol of fear and oppression.

30BBY - 41BBY

Jedi Training

The Clone Wars

As a Jedi Knight, I fought alongside my master, Obi-Wan Kenobi, in countless battles during the Clone Wars. Our victories brought hope to the Republic, but they also tested my patience and loyalty to the Jedi Code. I yearned for power and the ability to protect my loved ones, especially Padmé Amidala, the woman I secretly loved.
